comment: Good ~ Morning Yay ! & Today It's Happy ~ Birthday ~ To ~ Me Yay ! xoxo <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Good ~ Morning Yay ! & Today It's Happy ~ Birthday ~ To ~ Me Yay ! xoxo <URL>

            :mode expressive
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (m / morning)))
      :op2 (h / happy-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (b / birthday)
            :time (t / today))

            :op2 (y2 / yay))

            :value "xoxo"))

comment: Happy Happy Birthday ! ! Wishing you love and blessings ! ! XO ! !
amr:
# ::snt Happy Happy Birthday ! ! Wishing you love and blessings ! ! XO ! !
